verses.verse: And the men <WH376> of Efrayim <WH669> gathered themselves together <WH6817> <WH8735>, and went <WH5674> <WH8799> northward <WH6828>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yiftach <WH3316>, Wherefore passedst thou over <WH5674> <WH8804> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and didst not call <WH7121> <WH8804> us to go <WH3212> <WH8800> with thee? we will burn <WH8313> <WH8799> thine house <WH1004> upon thee with fire <WH784>.

And Yiftach <WH3316> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I and my people <WH5971> were <WH1961> <WH8804> at great <WH3966> strife <WH376> <WH7379> with the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>; and when I called <WH2199> <WH8799> you, ye delivered <WH3467> <WH8689> me not out of their hands <WH3027>.

And when I saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that ye delivered <WH3467> <WH8688> me not, I put <WH7760> <WH8799> my life <WH5315> in my hands <WH3709>, and passed over <WH5674> <WH8799> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into my hand <WH3027>: wherefore then are ye come up <WH5927> <WH8804> unto me this day <WH3117>, to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against me?

Then Yiftach <WH3316> gathered together <WH6908> <WH8799> all the men <WH582> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> with Efrayim <WH669>: and the men <WH582> of Gil`ad <WH1568> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> Efrayim <WH669>, because they said <WH559> <WH8804>, Ye Gil`adis <WH1568> are fugitives <WH6412> of Efrayim <WH669> among <WH8432> the Efrayimites <WH669>, and among <WH8432> the Manassites <WH4519>.

And the Gil`adis <WH1568> took <WH3920> <WH8799> the passages <WH4569> of Yarden <WH3383> before the Efrayimites <WH669>: and it was so, that when those Efrayimites <WH669> which were escaped <WH6412> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let me go over <WH5674> <WH8799>; that the men <WH582> of Gil`ad <WH1568> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Art thou an Efrayimite <WH673>? If he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Nay;

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> they unto him, Say <WH559> <WH8798> now Shibboleth <WH7641>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799> Sibboleth <WH5451>: for he could not frame <WH3559> to pronounce <WH1696> <WH8763> it right <WH3559> <WH8686>. Then they took <WH270> <WH8799> him, and slew <WH7819> <WH8799> him at the passages <WH4569> of Yarden <WH3383>: and there fell <WH5307> <WH8799> at that time <WH6256> of the Efrayimites <WH669> forty <WH705> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505>.

And Yiftach <WH3316> judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> six <WH8337> years <WH8141>. Then died <WH4191> <WH8799> Yiftach <WH3316> the Gil`adi <WH1569>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in one of the cities <WH5892> of Gil`ad <WH1568>.
And after <WH310> him Ibzan <WH78> of Beit-Lechem <WH1035> judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And he had thirty <WH7970> sons <WH1121>, and thirty <WH7970> daughters <WH1323>, whom he sent <WH7971> <WH8765> abroad <WH2351>, and took <WH935> <WH8689> in thirty <WH7970> daughters <WH1323> from abroad <WH2351> for his sons <WH1121>. And he judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.
Then died <WH4191> <WH8799> Ibzan <WH78>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> at Beit-Lechem <WH1035>.
And after <WH310> him Elon <WH356>, a Zebulonite <WH2075>, judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and he judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> ten <WH6235> years <WH8141>.
And Elon <WH356> the Zebulonite <WH2075> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in Aijalon <WH357> in the country <WH776> of Z'vulun <WH2074>.
And after <WH310> him Abdon <WH5658> the son <WH1121> of Hillel <WH1985>, a Pirathonite <WH6553>, judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And he had forty <WH705> sons <WH1121> and thirty <WH7970> nephews <WH1121> <WH1121>, that rode <WH7392> <WH8802> on threescore and ten <WH7657> ass colts <WH5895>: and he judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> eight <WH8083> years <WH8141>.

And Abdon <WH5658> the son <WH1121> of Hillel <WH1985> the Pirathonite <WH6553> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in Pirathon <WH6552> in the land <WH776> of Efrayim <WH669>, in the mount <WH2022> of the Amalekites <WH6003>.
